catalogue_raissonne: Hind 256 os; B.R.S.67; Mz. 236 os; Holl. 67 os; B-B.52-2
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
provenance: black stamp verso, H. Füssli and Co. (L.1008).
text: This print's nickname—rather than referring to a tomb, as was long thought—is derived from the name of the person who may have commissioned it, either Nicolaes or Pieter de la Tombe.
title: Christ Preaching
